Items.Name: EMIS Integration
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to keep a record of a patient's urine sample analysis
As a user
I want to transfer the results to the EMIS patient management system

Items.Name: Displaying Device Status
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to understand the current status of a connected UTS device
As a user
I want to see device status information displayed in the windows application

Questions:
When would the battery level be unknown? When top removed?

Items.Name: Displaying Device Errors
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to understand why the device has gone wrong
As a user
I want to see device error messages in the windows application

Items.Name: Analysing Sample
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to see when the UTS device is analysing a sample
As a user
I want to see a screen displaying a countdown until sample analysis is complete

Questions:
Will sample analysis time vary?

Items.Name: Software Lock
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to restrict the use of the UTS Device to licensed users
As a business person
I want to be able to lock the software

Questions:
What should happen if a licence expires during use?

Items.Name: Web Licence Server
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->In order to tell if a UTS device is licensed
As a business person
I want to query a web server with the device serial number
